titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Ways and Means in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Ways and Means in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Ways and Means for the 119th Congress.
